body.p: The portion attributable to pre‑combination services equals the market‑based measure of the acquiree award (CU100) multiplied by the ratio of the pre‑combination vesting period (four years) to the total vesting period (five years). Thus, CU80 (CU100 × 4/5 years) is attributed to the pre‑combination vesting period and therefore included in the consideration transferred in the business combination. The remaining CU20 is attributed to the post‑combination vesting period and is therefore recognised as remuneration cost in AC’s post‑combination financial statements in accordance with IFRS 2.
